mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OHR.HPS_CALENDAR CAL WHERE MINUS_DD = '0' AND (TO_CHAR(CAL.YMD,'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(#{staYmd},'YYYY') OR TO_CHAR(CAL.YMD,'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(#{endYmd},'YYYY'))

SELECT CAL.YMD FROM OHR.HPS_CALENDAR CAL WHERE MINUS_DD = '0' AND (TO_CHAR(CAL.YMD,'YYYY') = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12)) OR TO_CHAR(CAL.YMD,'YYYY') = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) OR TO_CHAR(CAL.YMD,'YYYY') = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 12)))
